page.title: List of tools to create Live USB systems

rev.diff:
Line 12: Line 12:
*The [[puredyne]] project provides a script ''make-live-device.sh'' which creates a Live USB system from an ISO image.
*The [[puredyne]] project provides a script ''make-live-device.sh'' which creates a Live USB system from an ISO image.
*[https://launchpad.net/win32-image-writer Win32 Disk Imager] (aka Image Writer for Windows), recommended by [[Arch Linux]] and [[Moblin]]
*[https://launchpad.net/win32-image-writer Win32 Disk Imager] (aka Image Writer for Windows), recommended by [[Arch Linux]] and [[Moblin]]

*[[Knoppix]] provides a tool 'flash-knoppix' <ref>[http://www.knopper.net/knoppix/knoppix-flash-en.html knopper.net The KNOPPIX flash station] </ref>
+
*[http://www.knopper.net/knoppix/knoppix-flash-en.html flash-knoppix] - tool provided by [[Knoppix]]
*[http://www.pendrivelinux.com/universal-usb-installer-easy-as-1-2-3/ PenDriveLinux Universal Linux USB Installer]
*[http://www.pendrivelinux.com/universal-usb-installer-easy-as-1-2-3/ PenDriveLinux Universal Linux USB Installer]
*[http://liveusb.info/dotclear/ Multiboot Live Usb] Install a lot of distribution of Linux well known, Windows, and a persistence mode .
*[http://liveusb.info/dotclear/ Multiboot Live Usb] Install a lot of distribution of Linux well known, Windows, and a persistence mode .
